item.description:
I really enjoyed this little place and want to try their lunch specials. For more information and photos, check out the event page from Nov. 20th...
http://sushi.meetup.c...

It is a very cozy restaurant with just a few tables, which gives it an intimate, fun atmosphere. The food was unique, delicious, and well-presented. A lot of the dishes are cooked, but there is a full range of "real" sushi items as well. If you like tempura, you really must try it..they have LOTS of interesting tempura rolls.

They have a few lunch specials in different price ranges...check them out here..
http://www.urbanspoon...

Hope to see you there!
Kelly

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch at Singo
